title: How to write a letter to my children’s school - Quora

response.answer_text: Principal’s name Name and address of school Dear Sir or Ma’am: I am sorry to inform you that our family will take a trip, and our children (Mary and Jim Smith) will be absent from school from (date) to (date). (We will go to (place name) to visit our relatives/The children’s grandfather has passed away, and we have to go to the funeral services/we are finally taking our long-anticipated trip to the U. S.) We would appreciate it if their teachers could send home work for them to study so that they won’t get too far behind. Thank you very much, (space for you to sign the letter) Mr. and Mrs. Smith
